channel.title: Ubuntu Help
channel.description:
I own a second computer I am going to use as my own personal game host. (Runescape, TMW & WoW) but for now I'm getting runescape up as it's the easiest of them all.
I used richscape as my base as we all know rich rocks in coding a stable source. His "initializer" looks like this : [code] @echo off title Server cd Source/Bin java Server pause[/code]
How can I put that into a .sh file? It is a very confusing task. I managed to get jre, jdk & plugins for the computer after long hours of figuring out the multiverse and other crap. Now this is just confusing me. It's Ubuntu 6.06 and it doesnt have [i]Nano[/i] just text editor. Please someone expirienced in linux servers please help.

item.title: Ubuntu Help
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Hai Oh Hai
item.description:
@Oh_Hai wrote:

I own a second computer I am going to use as my own personal game host. (Runescape, TMW & WoW) but for now I’m getting runescape up as it’s the easiest of them all.

I used richscape as my base as we all know rich rocks in coding a stable source. His “initializer” looks like this :

@echo off title Server cd Source/Bin java Server pause

How can I put that into a .sh file? It is a very confusing task. I managed to get jre, jdk & plugins for the computer after long hours of figuring out the multiverse and other crap. Now this is just confusing me. It’s Ubuntu 6.06 and it doesnt have Nano just text editor. Please someone expirienced in linux servers please help.
